mapper.select:
select * from DEMOTABLE where 1=1
and COL1 like '%'||#{col1}||'%'
and COL2 like '%${col2}%'
select distinct PROCESS_NAME from fixflow_def_processdefinition where PROCESS_KEY= #{procKey}
select node_name from FIXBPA_FLOW_NODE where processdefinition_key = #{procKey} and node_id = #{nodeID}

select case when DONE_COUNT = 0 then -1 else (SUM_TIME/DONE_COUNT) end as AVG_TIME, '平均处理时间' AS AVG_TIME_NAME from (select count(END_TIME) as DONE_COUNT,sum(WORK_TIME) as SUM_TIME from FIXBPA_FLOW_PROCESSINSTANCE )

select SUM(DONE_COUNT)/COUNT(PROCESSDEFINITION_KEY) AS AVG_DONE_COUNT, '平均完成次数' AS AVG_DONE_COUNT_NAME from (select PROCESSDEFINITION_KEY,count(END_TIME) as DONE_COUNT,sum(WORK_TIME) as SUM_TIME from FIXBPA_FLOW_PROCESSINSTANCE group by PROCESSDEFINITION_KEY)
